patterns: What are the different career options available?
What all can I pursue in the future?
responses:
You can choose among many professions and careers! There are 
 Humanities-Arts 
 Commerce 
 Science 
 Which stream would you like to explore?

A degree in science can open doors to numerous opportunities and professions! It is a wide subject through which you can choose among many professions like- 
-Architecture 
-Engineering 
-Medicine 
-Ayurveda 
-Paramedics. 
Which field would you like to know about?

Commerce is one of the most popular subjects that are pursued, mostly because of its versatility as well as its prospects. It gives the candidate knowledge on the business sector and on how one navigates through it. It equips them with real-time knowledge on subjects related to finance and transactions, comprising skills essential for navigating through life. The commerce course also acts as a stepping stone for pursuing several other careers such as Chartered Accountancy and Cost Accounting. It comprises of many courses- 
-Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) 
-Economics
-Business Adminstration (BBA)
- Chartered Accountant (CA) 
Which field would you like to know about?

Humanities are academic disciplines that involve the study of different aspects of human society and culture. These aspects include anthropology, archaeology, classics, human history, ancient and modern linguistics, law and politics, literature, philosophy, religion, performing and visual arts and many more. It can be pursued by the following proffesional degrees- 
-Bachelor of Arts 
-Bachelor of Design 
-BA in LLB (Law) 
-Psychology 
-Journalism
